name: UniScaleV2 Moderate
author: kim2091
description: These models work great on game textures when interpolated 50/50 with UniScale_Restore, and work amazingly on uncompressed images. DO NOT USE FOR COMPRESSED IMAGES, use the original UniScale or UltraSharp for that.
dataset: Custom Dataset consisting of lossless 4k frames from Metal Arms: Glitch in the System, Just Cause 3, Dirt 3, Forza Horizon 3, Sleeping Dogs, and self-edited photos from SignatureEdits + ATLA DVD images
